title: (x) Ben & Jerry's slab serif - custom font {Tim D}
content:
Any help identifying the Ben & Jerry's flavor font (from the [front of their pints](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126025031/http:/www.benjerry.com/our_products/flavor_details.cfm?product_id=27)) would be much appreciated...

thx
author: hos

comments.content:
I don't know if [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20140126025031/http:/64.233.179.104/search?q=cache:ucvsuaw9GaUJ:www.typophile.com/forums/read.php%3Ffile%3D/83/3156.html+jerry+site:typophile.com&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=9&client=safari) is still current

Tim

Thanks! I think I can make that work.

J
